title.rendered: A Place to Update Your Digital Skills- Manas Chhabra

content.rendered:
Digiperformer Manas Chabbra swears by the idea that learning is about expanding the ability to learn, updating skills and increasing knowledge. He believes that good learning skills are required to successfully adapt to changing work and life demands. He is a young entrepreneur who decided to pursue the Digital Marketing Course to enhance his skills and grow his business idea “Flash Me Right”.  Readout more about him here!

It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

I am Manas Chhabra and I believe in constant learning. I am ever ready to learn new skills and gain experience. 

What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

With the new age technology and a sudden boom in digital media, I thought it’s the correct time to tap into this market. Digital Media will only grow from now so it’s better to capture the customers through Digital Marketing. 

What exactly makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

I strongly believe that it’s the quality that matters at the end of the day. Well qualified trainers were the priority for me to choose this center.

Tell us about your favorite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

My favorite experience is that the trainers at the center were warm and helpful not only within the curriculum but outside also. They would connect us with the people who could help us grow, either in business or as for a job. 

Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

I would choose DigiPerform because they keep updating their curriculum and Digital Marketing in itself so dynamic and ever-growing, it is highly essential to stay updated with the trends.

If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

I would give it 9/10

Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years? 

I see myself as a successful businessman providing Digital Solutions to the people and companies. 

If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting, what would it be?

I think researching and studying the market before starting in any area is very important.

Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

A place to update your Digital Skills.
